original_text:
With cunning they conspire against your people;
    they plot against those you cherish.
korean_text: 그들이 주의 백성을 치려 하여 간계를 꾀하며 주께서 숨기신 자를 치려고 서로 의논하여

sentences.original_text: With cunning they conspire against your people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 교활하게 네 백성을 대적하여 모의하며

sentences.original_text: they plot against those you cherish
